subject: BWR
text_content:
Good evening, just to let you know that several machines have already been migrated. Today, Juan Gabriel contacted me regarding a support issue with a Fedora 34 server. I told him it was likely due to kernel version 5.14.9-200.
Although, checking the support matrix for Fedora, it only shows version 17.
For any of these reasons, do you know if there's a procedure for migrating this machine?
@⁨~Ivan Rivera⁩ we don't support this os version at present.
This is our os support matrix list: https://example.feishu.cn/sheets/VRqksSPEPhRTPStp3kVcItXNnyh?sheet=0MJNYC
Thanks Carlton, yes, I had already consulted it and it was the same thing I told the engineer, anyway I thank you for confirming the information,
You are welcome.
@⁨~Ivan Rivera⁩ just to confirm, as I can remember the state government is using VMware as source right?
Hi Michael, yes, indeed in the case of this machine it comes from a VMware 6.7, they also have some in Fusion Compute but those have not yet been migrated.
Thanks Ivan! In this case compatibility happens on destination site, that will be easier for RD helps the spinup, @⁨Xingzhuang Xu⁩ will bridge this
Oh, thank you very much. They told the engineer to leave it configured and wait to see if it can be started.

发自我的 iPhone
